title: He Bubble Evolution in LiAlO2: A Comparison of Human and Artificial Intelligence Based Analysis
content: The development of in situ transmission electron microscope (TEM) capabilities and artificial intelligence (AI) aided image analysis have reduced the time required to analyze still frames collected during an in situ TEM experiment. Here, we present analysis of helium bubble accumulation in LiAlO2 undergoing in situ TEM annealing performed at the In situ Ion Irradiation TEM [1]. The evolution from helium bubbles to larger bubbles was observed both as a function of helium implantation and distance from the grain boundaries, a factor not previously investigated in the study by Taylor et al. [2]. This presentation will compare manual versus artificial intelligence-based annotation of the same in situ TEM videos.
